credit_line: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
title: Maira Kalman:  Hey Willy, See the Pyramids
description:
An older sister makes up stories and tells them to her younger brother. Full-page, brightly colored illustrations on the right-hand page accompany the text, in bright blue-green type, on the left.
Reference: New York Public Library LEO catalog (nypl.org) - David Gale, "School Library Journal," Copyright 1988 Cahners Business Information, Inc.
name: Book
